argumentText:
ARGUMENT
y

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | prdsbasmpt2.y | |- Y = ( S Xs_ ( x e. I |-> R ) ) |
| 2 |  | prdsbasmpt2.b | |- B = ( Base ` Y ) |
| 3 |  | prdsbasmpt2.s | |- ( ph -> S e. V ) |
| 4 |  | prdsbasmpt2.i | |- ( ph -> I e. W ) |
| 5 |  | prdsbasmpt2.r | |- ( ph -> A. x e. I R e. X ) |
| 6 |  | prdsbasmpt2.k | |- K = ( Base ` R ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( x e. I |-> R ) = ( x e. I |-> R ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_fnmpt | |- ( A. x e. I R e. X -> ( x e. I |-> R ) Fn I ) |
| 9 | 5, 8 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> ( x e. I |-> R ) Fn I ) |
| 10 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 9 | #P_prdsbas2 | |- ( ph -> B = X_ y e. I ( Base ` ( ( x e. I |-> R ) ` y ) ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_nfcv | |- F/_ x Base |
| 12 |  | #P_nffvmpt1 | |- F/_ x ( ( x e. I |-> R ) ` y ) |
| 13 | 11, 12 | #P_nffv | |- F/_ x ( Base ` ( ( x e. I |-> R ) ` y ) ) |
| 14 |  | #P_nfcv | |- F/_ y ( Base ` ( ( x e. I |-> R ) ` x ) ) |
| 15 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( y = x -> ( ( x e. I |-> R ) ` y ) = ( ( x e. I |-> R ) ` x ) ) |
| 16 | 15 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( y = x -> ( Base ` ( ( x e. I |-> R ) ` y ) ) = ( Base ` ( ( x e. I |-> R ) ` x ) ) ) |
| 17 | 13, 14, 16 | #P_cbvixp | |- X_ y e. I ( Base ` ( ( x e. I |-> R ) ` y ) ) = X_ x e. I ( Base ` ( ( x e. I |-> R ) ` x ) ) |
| 18 | 10, 17 | #P_syl6eq | |- ( ph -> B = X_ x e. I ( Base ` ( ( x e. I |-> R ) ` x ) ) ) |
| 19 | 7 | #P_fvmpt2 | |- ( ( x e. I /\ R e. X ) -> ( ( x e. I |-> R ) ` x ) = R ) |
| 20 | 19 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ( x e. I /\ R e. X ) -> ( Base ` ( ( x e. I |-> R ) ` x ) ) = ( Base ` R ) ) |
| 21 | 20, 6 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( ( x e. I /\ R e. X ) -> ( Base ` ( ( x e. I |-> R ) ` x ) ) = K ) |
| 22 | 21 | #P_ralimiaa | |- ( A. x e. I R e. X -> A. x e. I ( Base ` ( ( x e. I |-> R ) ` x ) ) = K ) |
| 23 |  | #P_ixpeq2 | |- ( A. x e. I ( Base ` ( ( x e. I |-> R ) ` x ) ) = K -> X_ x e. I ( Base ` ( ( x e. I |-> R ) ` x ) ) = X_ x e. I K ) |
| 24 | 5, 22, 23 | #P_3syl | |- ( ph -> X_ x e. I ( Base ` ( ( x e. I |-> R ) ` x ) ) = X_ x e. I K ) |
| 25 | 18, 24 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ph -> B = X_ x e. I K ) |
